channel.title: Why does it SAY ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER?
channel.description:
hi there, im looking for someone to help me......
THE PROBLEM: when i try to logg in on most servers it always says ERROR CONNECTINIG TO SERVER---so any1 got any suggestions????? however i can get on my hybridscape server, but i want to go on other peoples..
thanks for all people who help :)

item.title: Why does it SAY ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER?
item.dc:creator: @bludwow0 bludwow0
item.description:
@bludwow0 wrote:

lol… everyone is having this problem due - to some techinical fault on himachi or server status or it could be even mopar… i have the same problem

item.title: Why does it SAY ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER?
item.dc:creator: @breaking_the_bridge breaking the bridge
item.description:
@breaking_the_bridge wrote:

It says that because the server you are trying to get on is either down or is being updated.
